#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pii pair<int,int>

#define ll long long
#define debug(x) cout<<">value ("<<#x<<") : "<<x<<endl;
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
        cin.tie(NULL);
//    freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
//    freopen("out.txt"."w",stdout);

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {

    ll n,i,even=0,odd=0,m;
    ll ans;
    cin>>n;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>m;
        if(m%2==0)
            even++;
        else
            odd++;
    }
    ans=even*odd;
    ans+=(even*(even-1))/2;
    cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
